formValidations.minlength1: The field must have at least 1 characters
formValidations.minlength2Dates: You must enter a valid date period
formValidations.minlength6: The field must have at least 6 characters
formValidations.minlength9: The field must have at least 9 characters
formValidations.maxlength10: The field must have a maximum of 10 characters
formValidations.maxlength12: The field must have a maximum of 12 characters

formValidations.onlyCharacters: The field must contain only letters
formValidations.onlyNumbers: The field must contain only numbers
formValidations.onlyNumbersAndLetters: The field must contain only numbers and letters

alert.confirmAction: Are you sure to perform this action?

temporalToken.alertMessage: Before continuing, the code of ({{tokenLong}}) digits sent to the address {{email}} is necessary, please enter it below:

signUp.checkTermsAndConditions: By registering you are accepting the personal data processing policies.
signUp.successfulRegistrationMessage: You can now continue with the purchase process.

dashboard.title: Start your purchase to live the WLDC experience
dashboard.subTitle: Select the option you want to get

hotelAndEvent.title: Hotel and event
hotelAndEvent.include: Accommodation at the official WLDC hotel with access to all WLDC events on the day the hotel is purchased, buffet breakfast
hotelAndEvent.notInclude: Gala dinner on Friday, February 9, 2024, competition categories, lunches and dinners, airfare and transfers

fullPass.title: Full Pass
fullPass.include: Access to all activities from February 5 to 11 such as: concert, parties, workshops, conferences, competition, Grand Final, Ultimate Championship, Music Park Fest, Pool Parties, Beaches and Gym
fullPass.notInclude: VIP Pool parties, Gala Dinner, special Bootcamp with international teachers, competition categories
fullPass.important: All competitors must have a Full Pass to access the event

passPerDay.title: Pass per day
passPerDay.notInclude: VIP Pool parties, Gala dinner, special Bootcamp with international teachers, categories to compete

weekendPass.title: Weekend Pass
weekendPass.include: Access to all activities from February 9 to 11 such as: concert, parties, workshops, conferences, competition, Grand Final, Ultimate Championship, Music Park Fest, Pool Parties, Beaches and Gym
weekendPass.notInclude: VIP Pool parties, Gala Dinner, special Bootcamp with international teachers, competition categories

room.include: Breakfast buffet, access to all the events of the day purchased by the hotel. For the purchase of Saturday night, access to Sunday's event is included
room.notInclude: Gala dinner on Friday, February 9, 2024, competition categories, lunches and dinners, tickets and transfers

hotelAndEvent.completeTheFieldsToSearchForRooms: Complete the fields to search for rooms
hotelAndEvent.chooseTheDatesOfYourStay: Choose the dates of your stay
hotelAndEvent.indicatesTheNumberOfPeopleInTheRoom: Indicates the number of people in the room
hotelAndEvent.availableRoomsWillBeShownHere: Available rooms will be shown here

notification.noRecognizeActivity: If you do not recognize this activity, no further action is required.
notification.noRequestCode: If you did not request this code, no further action is required.

temporalToken.subject: Temporal Token {{code}} WLDC Cartagena 2024
body: The code necessary to continue with your operation is the following:

signUp.subject: Welcome to WLDC Cartagena 2024 {{names}}
body: Welcome to the WLDC Cartagena 2024 application!
We are very happy to have your presence at the WLDC 2024 edition.
In the application you can purchase the packages to attend this great WLDC 2024 experience in Cartagena Colombia.

purchaseInfo.subject: Order {{orderId}} of WLDC Cartagena 2024
body: We are very happy to have your presence at the WLDC 2024 edition.
Below you will find the details of your order:
